name: Crabby Island (DanielOschepkov)
description:
What is it?

arcade retro game (which is totally not a horror) where you play as a man, who found himself on a small unknown island in the Pacific Ocean. You need to help him to keep signal campfire (by collecting wood parts, to keep fire on) and protect the island (and self) from CRABS or they will EAT you (or even SOMEBODY else will come to eat you, which you probably dont want to see here)

Gameplay

Protect island from crabs and keep campfire as long as possible

Controls

W,A,S,D - movement

LEFT and RIGHT arrows - shoot

Made by

Game by Daniel Oschepkov

Serious Duck Studios

If you liked the game, please, support with small donation :) (of course if you want)
